artefact.overview: Recognised bodies, listed bodies, recognised universities, accredited higher learning institutions, bogus degrees
artefact.body:
Higher learning institutions that are officially recognised in the UK are called either ‘recognised’ or ‘listed’ bodies

Recognised bodies are institutions that can award their own degrees. Listed bodies offer courses that can lead to a degree from a recognised body.

Check if a university or higher learning institution is a recognised body or a listed body.

If your degree’s awarded in the UK, it must come from a recognised or listed body - if it doesn’t, it will be considered bogus and won’t count when you’re looking for a job.
